lastfmr
  • Reference

Search for an album by name.

Search for an album by name. Returns album matches sorted by relevance. Implementation of last.fm's album.search API method (http://www.last.fm/api/show/album.search)

album_search(album, limit = NA, page = NA, api_key = lastkey)

Arguments

album

The album name.
limit

The number of results to fetch per page. Defaults to 50.
page

The page number you wish to scan to.
api_key

A Last.fm API key.

Value

A list of the searched albums.

Examples

album_search("Rhythm & Reason")
#> $`opensearch:Query`
#> $`opensearch:Query`$`#text`
#> [1] ""
#> 
#> $`opensearch:Query`$role
#> [1] "request"
#> 
#> $`opensearch:Query`$searchTerms
#> [1] "Rhythm & Reason"
#> 
#> $`opensearch:Query`$startPage
#> [1] "1"
#> 
#> 
#> $`opensearch:totalResults`
#> [1] "334"
#> 
#> $`opensearch:startIndex`
#> [1] "0"
#> 
#> $`opensearch:itemsPerPage`
#> [1] "50"
#> 
#> $albummatches
#> $albummatches$album
